title: Oath of Devotion
content:
aladin's primary Ability is Strength, their Saving Throw proficiencies are Wisdom & Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d10 per Paladin level. They have proficiency with Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons, and all Armor and Shields.

Following the ideal of the knight in shining armour, you act with honour and virtue to protect the weak and pursue the greater good.

BG3 Paladin Class Features

Hit Points at 1st level: 10 + Constitution modifier Hit Points at Higher Levels: 6 + Constitution modifie
